about_the_game:
Heartshield is happy to launch our first ever game ‘The Mouse the Merrier’.

The Mouse the Merrier is a cozy puzzle game about reuniting a mouse with his lost family. Traverse through a beautiful flooded landscape, sliding along floating petals and hopping onto buttons. Help Mousimus find his family and try your best not to leave anymouse behind!

​The Mouse the Merrier is intended for casual play! So sit back, relax and enjoy the many mouse puns. The game can be completed without finishing every single level, so if you ever find yourself stuck on a level - simply move to a different one!

Features:
  • 40+ levels to play
  • Play how you like
  • Adorable mice and horrible puns
  • Handcrafted fun and challenging levels
  • Perfect for all ages!
